summary: Demo analysis of a morning routine automation with overlapping triggers.

issues.description: Multiple triggers within 5 seconds can overlap when presence is detected at the same time as sunrise.
No guard to skip when nobody is home.

recommendations: Add a condition `person.anyone_home == home` before actions.
Add a `for: 00:00:10` to motion trigger to avoid double fires.
Deduplicate actions with a choose block keyed on the trigger id.
